about_the_game:
In this Demo, you'll meet Yuki and accompany her through her day-to-day life at school, meeting her quirky classmates and discovering the origins of her ambitious plan to become an idol capable of bending the masses.

You'll explore some of Kaotica's nooks and crannies and meet some of its colourful inhabitants, helping them (or not) with their personal interests - you'll even face off in a tweet duel!

Love Me or Die is a retro graphic adventure that blends fame, mystery, and sharp humor. Join Yuki in her quest to become the most popular idol in Kaótica, a city brimming with eccentric characters and hidden secrets. When a tragic twist derails her dream, Yuki will face a dark enigma that challenges everything she believes in. Solve puzzles, challenge rivals in tweet battles, and explore a pixelated world full of surprises and unexpected twists.

Yuki, a lonely and misunderstood teenager, is fed up with being invisible to society. After a particularly disastrous day when both school and friends turn their backs on her, she decides to take a shortcut to fame by imitating a famous idol in a desperate attempt to gain recognition and acceptance. However, after a tragic incident during her first major performance, Yuki is drawn into a dark mystery that forces her to question everything she’s fought for. Abandoning her pursuit of popularity, she embarks on a dangerous investigation that could change everything.

Immerse yourself in a captivating narrative inspired by classics like Monkey Island, featuring a pixelated visual style that pays homage to the great adventures of the past. Discover nods and references to your favorite games as you explore a world full of memorable characters and hidden secrets.

Solve puzzles and combine objects to uncover the truth while preparing for decisive tweet battles. In these critical moments, your sharp responses and quick reflexes will be essential to gain popularity and advance the story. All this while enjoying biting humor that adds an acidic twist to your interactions with the eccentric inhabitants of Kaótica.

A retro graphic adventure with challenging puzzles, intense tweet battles, and a pixelated world filled with humor and mysteries.
